featured.text: “The blessing that Morgan has brought is beyond anything that I ever could have imagined and could explain.” 53.
Over the centuries, henna tattoos 16 used in weddings and holiday celebrations because they are thought to carry blessings from the gods.

definition.en_def: A beneficial thing for which one is grateful; a favor or gift bestowed by God.
definition.example: She received the blessing of her parents before starting her new journey.
